title: (x) Imagine Fellowship logo Bauhaus geometric sans - Chalet Paris 1970 {Akira}
content:
I came across a logo and love the font that they use, but can’t figure out what it is. I’m leaning toward a custom logo type maybe, but thought I’d seek the opinion of the font gurus here before I gave up the search.

Here is the logo. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011005im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4X6_IF-LOGO-white_5103.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [4X6\_IF-LOGO-white.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011005/http:/typophile.com/files/4X6_IF-LOGO-white.jpg) | 6.22 KB |

 [‹ (x) Cup and Show Week logo serif face - ITC Garamond (modified) {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011005/http:/typophile.com/node/47701 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bold sans "Quit work make music" on T-shirt - Futura {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011005/http:/typophile.com/node/47716 "Go to next forum topic")
author: connman

comments.content:
WOW! That’s it!

I feel really humble. I spent hours and hours over the past couple of days looking for this. You’re amazing akira1975!
